title: Respond to RFP for Professional Services
description: A large potential customer has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a complex implementation project.

tasks.description: Review the RFP document to understand the customer's requirements, scope, and evaluation criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant has a full understanding of the customer's needs.

tasks.description: Estimate the total hours and resources required to deliver the project as described in the RFP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant creates a detailed effort estimate.

tasks.description: Write a formal proposal document, including the project plan, timeline, team roles, and pricing, and submit it to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant submits a high-quality, comprehensive RFP response.
